title: New Update?? Can't reconnect
body: So I just updated the new version yesterday, and when I went to play it today everything seemed to be ok. I could login, chat etc. But when I went to play  a match it said that I had disconnected. I checked my internet and its fine but I still can't reconnect. Is this something to do with the new update or not??

replies.body:
This is a common occurrence when your computer has a poor connection to our servers. This is frequently fixed by the steps listed inside our [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues), so I'd recommend giving those steps a try.

Let me know if they helped.
